alert.note: Alert for Pierce (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 04 at 6:32PM PDT until November 05 at 10:18AM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Washington... Tolt River Above Carnation affecting King County. Puyallup River Near Orting affecting Pierce County. .Heavy rain associated with an atmospheric river will come to an end Friday evening. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Puyallup River Near Orting. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 10,000.0 cfs, the Puyallup river will flood low lying areas near Orting and along the upper reaches, including along Orville Road East south of Brooks Road, Neadham Road, and the vicinity of the County Subdivision/Tomolla Farm. High flows will also increase the threat of channel migration and bank erosion. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM PDT Friday the flow was 1,260.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest near 12,600 cfs late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood flow is 10,000.0 cfs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by late tonight at 230 AM PDT.
